metadata.title: CVE-2021-46943 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  media: staging/intel-ipu3: Fix set_fmt error handling  If there in an error during a set_fmt, do not overwrite the previous sizes with the invalid config.  Without this patch, v4l2-compliance ends up allocating 4GiB of RAM and causing the following OOPs  [   38.662975] ipu3-imgu 0000:00:05.0: swiotlb buffer is full (sz: 4096 bytes) [   38.662980] DMA: Out of SW-IOMMU space for 4096 bytes at device 0000:00:05.0 [   38.663010] general protection fault: 0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP
